SELECT A.* FROM (
SELECT WorkItemID , ProcessID , Name , DSCR , PerformerID , UserName , Created , FinishRequested , ProcessState FROM (SELECT WorkItemID , W.ProcessID , W.Name , W.DSCR , PerformerID , UserName , Created AS Created , FinishRequested AS FinishRequested , P.ProcessState AS ProcessState FROM covi_approval4j.JWF_WorkItem AS W JOIN covi_approval4j.JWF_Process AS P ON W.ProcessID = P.ProcessID WHERE W.State = 275 ) AS SUB_TABLE ORDER BY FinishRequested DESC

) A
